column1: 1) If you haven't already created any account
column2: you will need to establish a Stripe account.
then log in to your Stripe dashboard.

column1: 3) Click your account name in the top left.
4) Click API in the left menu.
5) Your secret and publishable keys should be on this page.
Note: You may be promoted to enter your password to receive the secret key.
6) Enable Instant Payment Notifications via: Developers > Webhooks >. The IPN messages should be enabled
